removeFromContext.description: any folder that is between file name and context that you want to remove

remotePath.description:
path of the target system 
 Example: localFile: x/y/c/zz/controller/main.controller.js 
 remoteFile: y/c/controller/main.controller.js

rootConfig.description:
Gets the config from other miisync.json file. Can be relative or absolute path. 
Must point to where .vscode is located

uploadOnSave.description: Uploads the current file to the system whenever you save it.

downloadOnOpen.description: Downloads the file to the system whenever you open it.
